about_the_game:
Created by a guy with a knack for big numbers and a vendetta against pests, comes an incremental clicker/idler that takes a different approach on progress: No prestige mechanic.

Features of the game include, but not limited to.

  • Strategic attacking is rewarded and clients pay more for a job well done!
  • Numerous achievements to be gotten for those who enjoy them!
  • Destroy pests any way you can with whatever weapons you acquire.
  • Swarms of bugs, special glowing bugs with extra rewards.
  • No prestige mechanic, so your progress will always increment.
  • Costs of items, upgrades and values were simulated and tested and values are not arbitrary.
  • Very few people actually read these text descriptions, and if you did, the next line will surprise you
  • Set your company name to "Thoroughly Inc." to get a nice 2500 coins to upgrade your first weapon right away.
  • Still reading? Making your name "Reader" will also unlock the sticky trap for the first level.
  • Just how far does it go? Who knows, perhaps you'll find out.

Your play style is your choice. An armada of bugs are awaiting their annihilation!
If you choose to idle, there are numerous traps you can set to encourage critters to sniff it out and find out what's really inside. (It's not candy).

Additional note: While the game isn't a Virtual Reality game - it seems to work with the Quest 2 VR headset and is quite fun in that mode!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4400
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Should work fine on linux, but limited testing shows it works.

name: Bug Blazer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4400
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is scaled for 16:9 ratio, so bars will be created if the window size or fullscreen size is not that ratio.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Quad-Core CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960/AMD Radeon R9 285
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

short_description: A casual Incremental idler/clicker mix with a variety of weapons and traps to achieve your goals. No prestige, and ever increasing progress; watch the numbers get ever larger to the point where the fabric of reality breaks down.
